about_the_game:
An open world, spiritual, movement adventure where you craft your own hippy parkour being and set out to discover the secrets of love, manifestation and expression.

A Completely Unique, Physics Based Movement System

Express yourself with a 'grab and throw' system that asks you to generate YOUR OWN power. Use your own elbow grease and skill with the mouse to throw yourself around your environment.

  • Run,
  • Jump,
  • Slide,
  • Climb,
  • Vault,
  • Wallrun,
  • Dive
  • and Swing

in a movement system that'll leave you feeling more in flow than Lao Tzu himself.

I can sense the droplets of your sweaty little palms, speedrunners ;)

Craft Your Own Hippie

Show the world how totally unique you are with your baggie pants n' bare feet, or opt for a more 'boho' look.

Customize your Hippie with:

  • Shirts,
  • Pants,
  • Ponchos,
  • Shoes,
  • Jewellery,
  • Tattoos,
  • Hair,
  • Glowing Cult Symbology

Essentially whatever you find!

Climb The Chakral Column

Discover new heights of awareness by ascending the 'Chakral Column'. An ancient and oh-so-serious journey that will blow your understanding of reality out of any fathomable grasp.

Explore A Juicy, Spiritual World

Discover just how many hours I put into this goddamn game by exploring a vast and intricate world that's full of strange and occasionally unnerving secrets.
  • Meet interesting strangers and spiritual gurus, all weird, all a bit stinky
  • Discover deep universal truths and secrets to master your reality
  • Find new pieces of gear to help you navigate your environment

Upgrade Your Awareness, Back Or Forward

Increase your strength, unlock new abilities to more effectively interact with the world around you, or make yourself hella speedy n' zoom around like a stinky little gremlin. With this unique and interesting progression system, you can pick and choose how powerful you'd like to be and fine-tune yourself to be exactly the being you desire.

content_descriptors.notes: Game's pretty chill. The worst that'll happen is you'll fight baddies and they'll eventually die, or maybe you'll hear me talk about the subject of sex as a conversational topic.

name: Mozentum

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-13400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: None
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Above
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-10750H CPU @ 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060 or above
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: Subject to change minimum and maximum values cause I don't know much about them yet!

short_description: Arise from your van (it's 4:00 bro, come on) and take on the role of a hippy hellbent on discovering the secrets of a strange and oddly familiar place... One incense stick at a time.
